Package cycling

Class CyclingPortal

  • java.lang.Object
    • cycling.CyclingPortal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CyclingPortalInterface, MiniCyclingPortalInterface, java.io.Serializable
    public class CyclingPortal
extends java.lang.Object
implements CyclingPortalInterface
    CyclingPortal implements CyclingPortalInterface; contains methods for handling the following classes: Race, Stage, Segment, RiderManager (and in turn Rider and Team), and Result. These classes are used manage races and their subdivisions, teams and their riders, and to calculate and assign points from riders' results. Also contains methods for saving and loading (Mini)CyclingPortalInterface to and from a file.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • createRace

        public int createRace​(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String description)
               throws IllegalNameException,
                      InvalidNameException
        Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortalInterface
        The method creates a staged race in the platform with the given name and description.

        The state of this MiniCyclingPortalInterface must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

        Specified by:
        createRace in interface MiniCyclingPortalInterface
        Parameters:
        name - Race's name.
        description - Race's description (can be null).
        Returns:
        the unique ID of the created race.
        Throws:
        IllegalNameException - If the name already exists in the platform.
        InvalidNameException - If the name is null, empty, has more than 30 characters, or has white spaces.

      • addStageToRace

        public int addStageToRace​(int raceId,
                          java.lang.String stageName,
                          java.lang.String description,
                          double length,
                          java.time.LocalDateTime startTime,
                          StageType type)
                   throws IDNotRecognisedException,
                          IllegalNameException,
                          InvalidNameException,
                          InvalidLengthException
        Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortalInterface
        Creates a new stage and adds it to the race.

        The state of this MiniCyclingPortalInterface must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

        Specified by:
        addStageToRace in interface MiniCyclingPortalInterface
        Parameters:
        raceId - The race which the stage will be added to.
        stageName - An identifier name for the stage.
        description - A descriptive text for the stage.
        length - Stage length in kilometres.
        startTime - The date and time in which the stage will be raced. It cannot be null.
        type - The type of the stage. This is used to determine the amount of points given to the winner.
        Returns:
        the unique ID of the stage.
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match to any race in the system.
        IllegalNameException - If the name already exists in the platform.
        InvalidNameException - If the new name is null, empty, has more than 30.
        InvalidLengthException - If the length is less than 5km.

      • addCategorizedClimbToStage

        public int addCategorizedClimbToStage​(int stageId,
                                      java.lang.Double location,
                                      SegmentType type,
                                      java.lang.Double averageGradient,
                                      java.lang.Double length)
                               throws IDNotRecognisedException,
                                      InvalidLocationException,
                                      InvalidStageStateException,
                                      InvalidStageTypeException
        Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortalInterface
        Adds a climb segment to a stage.

        The state of this MiniCyclingPortalInterface must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

        Specified by:
        addCategorizedClimbToStage in interface MiniCyclingPortalInterface
        Parameters:
        stageId - The ID of the stage to which the climb segment is being added.
        location - The kilometre location where the climb finishes within the stage.
        type - The category of the climb - SegmentType.C4, SegmentType.C3, SegmentType.C2, SegmentType.C1, or SegmentType.HC.
        averageGradient - The average gradient for the climb.
        length - The length of the climb in kilometre.
        Returns:
        The ID of the segment created.
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match to any stage in the system.
        InvalidLocationException - If the location is out of bounds of the stage length.
        InvalidStageStateException - If the stage is "waiting for results".
        InvalidStageTypeException - Time-trial stages cannot contain any segment.

                 throws IDNotRecognisedException

      • registerRiderResultsInStage

        public void registerRiderResultsInStage​(int stageId,
                                        int riderId,
                                        java.time.LocalTime... checkpoints)
                                 throws IDNotRecognisedException,
                                        DuplicatedResultException,
                                        InvalidCheckpointsException,
                                        InvalidStageStateException
        Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortalInterface
        Record the times of a rider in a stage.

        The state of this MiniCyclingPortalInterface must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

        Specified by:
        registerRiderResultsInStage in interface MiniCyclingPortalInterface
        Parameters:
        stageId - The ID of the stage the result refers to.
        riderId - The ID of the rider.
        checkpoints - An array of times at which the rider reached each of the segments of the stage, including the start time and the finish line.
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match to any rider or stage in the system.
        DuplicatedResultException - Thrown if the rider has already a result for the stage. Each rider can have only one result per stage.
        InvalidCheckpointsException - Thrown if the length of checkpoints is not equal to n+2, where n is the number of segments in the stage; +2 represents the start time and the finish time of the stage.
        InvalidStageStateException - Thrown if the stage is not "waiting for results". Results can only be added to a stage while it is "waiting for results".

      • getRiderResultsInStage

        public java.time.LocalTime[] getRiderResultsInStage​(int stageId,
                                                    int riderId)
                                             throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortalInterface
        Get the times of a rider in a stage.

        The state of this MiniCyclingPortalInterface must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

        Specified by:
        getRiderResultsInStage in interface MiniCyclingPortalInterface
        Parameters:
        stageId - The ID of the stage the result refers to.
        riderId - The ID of the rider.
        Returns:
        The array of times at which the rider reached each of the segments of the stage and the total elapsed time. The elapsed time is the difference between the finish time and the start time. Return an empty array if there is no result registered for the rider in the stage.
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match to any rider or stage in the system.

      • getRiderAdjustedElapsedTimeInStage

        public java.time.LocalTime getRiderAdjustedElapsedTimeInStage​(int stageId,
                                                              int riderId)
                                                       throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortalInterface
        For the general classification, the aggregated time is based on the adjusted elapsed time, not the real elapsed time. Adjustments are made to take into account groups of riders finishing very close together, e.g., the peloton. If a rider has a finishing time less than one second slower than the previous rider, then their adjusted elapsed time is the smallest of both. For instance, a stage with 200 riders finishing "together" (i.e., less than 1 second between consecutive riders), the adjusted elapsed time of all riders should be the same as the first of all these riders, even if the real gap between the 200th and the 1st rider is much bigger than 1 second. There is no adjustments on elapsed time on time-trials.

        The state of this MiniCyclingPortalInterface must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

        Specified by:
        getRiderAdjustedElapsedTimeInStage in interface MiniCyclingPortalInterface
        Parameters:
        stageId - The ID of the stage the result refers to.
        riderId - The ID of the rider.
        Returns:
        The adjusted elapsed time for the rider in the stage. Return an empty array if there is no result registered for the rider in the stage.
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match to any rider or stage in the system.

      • deleteRiderResultsInStage

        public void deleteRiderResultsInStage​(int stageId,
                                      int riderId)

        public int[] getRidersRankInStage​(int stageId)
                           throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortalInterface
        Get the riders finished position in a a stage.

        The state of this MiniCyclingPortalInterface must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

        Specified by:
        getRidersRankInStage in interface MiniCyclingPortalInterface

      • getRankedAdjustedElapsedTimesInStage

        public java.time.LocalTime[] getRankedAdjustedElapsedTimesInStage​(int stageId)
                                                           throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortalInterface
        Get the adjusted elapsed times of riders in a stage.

        The state of this MiniCyclingPortalInterface must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

        Specified by:
        getRankedAdjustedElapsedTimesInStage in interface MiniCyclingPortalInterface
        Parameters:
        stageId - The ID of the stage being queried.
        Returns:
        The ranked list of adjusted elapsed times sorted by their finish time. An empty list if there is no result for the stage. These times should match the riders returned by MiniCyclingPortalInterface.getRidersRankInStage(int).
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any stage in the system.

      • getRidersPointsInStage

        public int[] getRidersPointsInStage​(int stageId)
                             throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortalInterface
        Get the number of points obtained by each rider in a stage.

        The state of this MiniCyclingPortalInterface must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

        Specified by:
        getRidersPointsInStage in interface MiniCyclingPortalInterface
        Parameters:
        stageId - The ID of the stage being queried.
        Returns:
        The ranked list of points each riders received in the stage, sorted by their elapsed time. An empty list if there is no result for the stage. These points should match the riders returned by MiniCyclingPortalInterface.getRidersRankInStage(int).
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any stage in the system.

      • getRidersMountainPointsInStage

        public int[] getRidersMountainPointsInStage​(int stageId)
                                     throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortalInterface
        Get the number of mountain points obtained by each rider in a stage.

        The state of this MiniCyclingPortalInterface must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

        Specified by:
        getRidersMountainPointsInStage in interface MiniCyclingPortalInterface
        Parameters:
        stageId - The ID of the stage being queried.
        Returns:
        The ranked list of mountain points each riders received in the stage, sorted by their finish time. An empty list if there is no result for the stage. These points should match the riders returned by MiniCyclingPortalInterface.getRidersRankInStage(int).
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any stage in the system.

      • getGeneralClassificationTimesInRace

        public java.time.LocalTime[] getGeneralClassificationTimesInRace​(int raceId)
                                                          throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Description copied from interface: CyclingPortalInterface
        Get the general classification times of riders in a race.

        The state of this MiniCyclingPortalInterface must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

        Specified by:
        getGeneralClassificationTimesInRace in interface CyclingPortalInterface
        Parameters:
        raceId - The ID of the race being queried.
        Returns:
        A list of riders' times sorted by the sum of their adjusted elapsed times in all stages of the race. An empty list if there is no result for any stage in the race. These times should match the riders returned by CyclingPortalInterface.getRidersGeneralClassificationRank(int).
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any race in the system.

      • getRidersPointsInRace

        public int[] getRidersPointsInRace​(int raceId)
                            throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Description copied from interface: CyclingPortalInterface
        Get the overall points of riders in a race.

        The state of this MiniCyclingPortalInterface must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

        Specified by:
        getRidersPointsInRace in interface CyclingPortalInterface
        Parameters:
        raceId - The ID of the race being queried.
        Returns:
        A list of riders' points (i.e., the sum of their points in all stages of the race), sorted by the total elapsed time. An empty list if there is no result for any stage in the race. These points should match the riders returned by CyclingPortalInterface.getRidersGeneralClassificationRank(int).
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any race in the system.

      • getRidersMountainPointsInRace

        public int[] getRidersMountainPointsInRace​(int raceId)
                                    throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Description copied from interface: CyclingPortalInterface
        Get the overall mountain points of riders in a race.

        The state of this MiniCyclingPortalInterface must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

        Specified by:
        getRidersMountainPointsInRace in interface CyclingPortalInterface
        Parameters:
        raceId - The ID of the race being queried.
        Returns:
        A list of riders' mountain points (i.e., the sum of their mountain points in all stages of the race), sorted by the total elapsed time. An empty list if there is no result for any stage in the race. These points should match the riders returned by CyclingPortalInterface.getRidersGeneralClassificationRank(int).
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any race in the system.

      • getRidersGeneralClassificationRank

        public int[] getRidersGeneralClassificationRank​(int raceId)
                                         throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Description copied from interface: CyclingPortalInterface
        Get the general classification rank of riders in a race.

        The state of this MiniCyclingPortalInterface must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

        Specified by:
        getRidersGeneralClassificationRank in interface CyclingPortalInterface
        Parameters:
        raceId - The ID of the race being queried.
        Returns:
        A ranked list of riders' IDs sorted ascending by the sum of their adjusted elapsed times in all stages of the race. That is, the first in this list is the winner (least time). An empty list if there is no result for any stage in the race.
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any race in the system.

      • getRidersPointClassificationRank

        public int[] getRidersPointClassificationRank​(int raceId)
                                       throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Description copied from interface: CyclingPortalInterface
        Get the ranked list of riders based on the points classification in a race.

        The state of this MiniCyclingPortalInterface must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

        Specified by:
        getRidersPointClassificationRank in interface CyclingPortalInterface
        Parameters:
        raceId - The ID of the race being queried.
        Returns:
        A ranked list of riders' IDs sorted descending by the sum of their points in all stages of the race. That is, the first in this list is the winner (more points). An empty list if there is no result for any stage in the race.
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any race in the system.

      • getRidersMountainPointClassificationRank

        public int[] getRidersMountainPointClassificationRank​(int raceId)

        Returns:
        A ranked list of riders' IDs sorted descending by the sum of their mountain points in all stages of the race. That is, the first in this list is the winner (more points). An empty list if there is no result for any stage in the race.
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any race in the system.
